content: I’m a second year computer science graduate student at the University of Groningen and a core developer of Flask Monitoring Dashboard. I’m currently (April 2019) working on my master’s thesis, called Measuring the Performance of a Performance Monitor. The case of the Flask Monitoring Dashboard.

title: Bogdan Petre

title: Automatic monitoring & profiling of Flask application
